lead_paragraph: KRAMPNER--Robert, 96, died January 15 in Silver Spring, Maryland. He is survived by sons Jon Krampner of Los Angeles and Michael Krampner and his wife Ellen of Silver Spring; grandchildren Betsy Erickson and Charlie Krampner, both of Casper, Wyoming; brother Herbert Krampner of New York; and nephews John Krampner of Astoria and Joseph Sterinbach of Bayside. Graveside service 1:30pm today at Wellwood Cemetery, West Babylon, NY. Funeral services by Plaza Jewish Community Chapel of Manhattan. 1/3
